A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible movie. I won't see this movie again nor will I see any Star Wars movie this director makes.  The movie was full of stupid jokes\, forced scenes\, scenes that went no where\, harsh language for a star wars movies\, crazy made up Jedi powers\, a terrible Luke\, a flying Leia\, throws out the movie that came before it\, milking big bird\, the list goes on.
